last_episode_to_air.name: memento mori
last_episode_to_air.overview: Drew is determined to settle the score with Dan now that he knows the truth. Kevin finds out his fate with the art fellowship. Zayna’s world is upended when her dad is unexpectedly released from prison. Season finale.

name: Flatbush Misdemeanors
overview: Neighborhood best friends and urban millennials Dan and Kevin hilariously climb the ladder to nowhere in Flatbush, Brooklyn. But even inside the losing, they find there are little wins that come from tackling hipsters, mental health issues and the rising tide of gentrification.

episodes.name: leanin'
episodes.overview: Longtime friends Kevin and Dan struggle to thrive in their new surroundings in Flatbush, Brooklyn, but when Kevin accidentally spills a local drug dealer’s promethazine while on a routine food delivery, both their lives are thrown into unexpected upheaval. Series premiere.

episodes.name: vortex
episodes.overview: Zayna deals with a rumor she had sex with her teenage crush while Kevin deals with delivering on his first freelance painting job. Dan excitedly prepares to attend Jess’s birthday party. But their worlds collide when Drew’s demands impact all their lives.

episodes.name: the chicken or the egg
episodes.overview: When Kevin and Dan’s beloved jazz musician neighbor faces eviction, Kevin enlists Jasmine to organize a protest. Meanwhile, Dan anxiously dreads an after-school meeting with Jess to discuss a Child Services case, where he expects to be fired for his ties to Drew and Zayna.

episodes.name: retrograde
episodes.overview: Kevin, bummed from being stood up by Jasmine and ripped off by a local Brooklyn rapper, spends a ’shrooms-filled night out with his successful sister which leads to a series of revelations. Meanwhile, in an effort to make Dan bond with his stepdad Kareem, Dan’s mom drags him into competing in the Greenest Block in Brooklyn contest.

episodes.name: dub
episodes.overview: Dan vies for a position as head coach of his school’s basketball team. Kevin has a surprising encounter with Drew that begins a shift in their dynamic. Zayna, suspended from the dance team for her fight with Dami, has to figure out how to deal with the consequences.

episodes.name: bad connection
episodes.overview: Dan and Kevin’s growing roommate tensions coincide with an ongoing fight between their new neighbors. But when Dan struggles to have much-needed Zoom therapy with his brutally honest therapist, she somehow manages to resolve everyone’s issues simultaneously.

episodes.name: lockdown
episodes.overview: When the school goes on lockdown due to a bomb threat from an expelled student, Dan moves to help Jess defuse the situation while Zayna learns a shocking secret about her family through Dami. Meanwhile, Kevin meets with a gallery owner, who gives his work an honest review.

episodes.name: lakay
episodes.overview: Zayna checks out rumors about her family and discovers that Drew’s responsible for her father being in jail, which leads to her going on the run. While Drew and Kevin look high and low for her, Dan and Jess’s emerging, secret relationship is tested and everyone’s worlds collide.

episodes.name: breaking
episodes.overview: After breaking protocol, Dan and Jess face consequences at their job. Meanwhile, Kevin discovers Dan lied to him about Zayna. The fracture between the two longtime friends drives Kevin to seek Drew’s friendship, all of which culminates in a tragic circumstance.

episodes.name: peace
episodes.overview: After a shocking tragedy as a result of Kevin hanging out with Drew, Dan and Kevin argue about the merits of their friendship. Meanwhile, Zayna, who’s secretly staying at Dami’s house to avoid Drew, faces a decision about her future. A final turn leaves all of their futures in question. Season finale.

episodes.name: return
episodes.overview: Dan seeks to clear his reputation so he can be reinstated as a teacher – but Kevin has left town and is ignoring his calls. Drew, still in hiding from the police, struggles to get Zayna back in school.

episodes.name: obiageli
episodes.overview: Kevin returns to his childhood home until the trouble in Flatbush dies down.

episodes.name: and to think i saw it on snyder ave
episodes.overview: Drew gets frustrated as Zayna continues to flex her independence. Kevin returns to Flatbush to start his art fellowship. Dan gets acquainted with his NA group, then has a run-in with Drew that leads to unexpected consequences.

episodes.name: switzerland
episodes.overview: Zayna discovers the downside of living on her own and the responsibility that comes with it. Kevin and Dan’s professional lives are put on hold when they attend a funeral of an old friend.

episodes.name: boomerang
episodes.overview: Dan finally feels comfortable in NA, connecting with Sydney – until a surprise turns Dan’s safe space upside-down. Kevin struggles to navigate the politics of his art fellowship. Drew’s release from jail comes at a high price.

episodes.name: sandcastles
episodes.overview: Kevin is forced to confront Drew for the first time since returning to Flatbush. Zayna fears she may be losing her new boyfriend, Desmond. Dan and Sydney flirt with breaking the unwritten rule of NA.

episodes.name: scorpions and frogs
episodes.overview: Drew and Zayna try to repair their relationship after visiting her dad in jail. Kevin and Dan find themselves entangled in the mess that is Kareem and Maria’s love life. Dan wrestles over whether to finally share his secret to Kevin.

episodes.name: hot potato
episodes.overview: Zayna promises to help Amaya stay out of trouble. Dan attempts to control his Sex Ed class to pass his teacher evaluation. Drew finds his way into Kevin’s art world once he decides to get out of the drug business once and for all.

episodes.name: boiling point
episodes.overview: Kevin’s connection to Drew jeopardizes his art fellowship. Family obligations put Desmond and Zayna’s relationship to the test. Dan agrees to help Drew find legit employment, until revelations between Dan, Drew and Sydney change everything.

episodes.name: memento mori
episodes.overview: Drew is determined to settle the score with Dan now that he knows the truth. Kevin finds out his fate with the art fellowship. Zayna’s world is upended when her dad is unexpectedly released from prison. Season finale.
